context: The word 'aafrika' in Estonian refers to the continent Africa. It can be used as a noun meaning 'Africa' or as an adjective meaning 'African'. The dictionary shows it has genitive and indeclinable forms, and is commonly used in compound words like 'Aafrika elevant' (African elephant), 'Aafrika p체hvel' (African buffalo), and 'Aafrika katk' (African fever/disease affecting horses and pigs).
